evidence.text: This Order shall remain in effect until October 1, 2025.
The court therefore prohibits Defendants from re-obligating or otherwise diminishing the sums awarded but terminated under Plaintiffs’ grant agreements.

extracted.value: Prohibit defendants from re-obligating or diminishing sums awarded but terminated under plaintiffs’ grant agreements.

evidence.text: The parties shall file a Joint Status Report by September 29, 2025.

extracted.value: Defendants must file a Joint Status Report by September 29, 2025.

evidence.text: The parties shall advise whether the injunction should be extended.

extracted.value: Defendants must advise whether the injunction should be extended.
